price: "Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa ya ɓatar da ni daga Tunãwa a bãyan (Tunãwar) ta je mini."Kuma Shaiɗan ya zama mai zumɓulẽwa ga mutum.
arabic: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad aḍallanī ʿani al-dhik'ri baʿda idh jāanī wakāna al-shayṭānu lil'insāni khadhūlan
